author: Stuart Harrison
comment: Works great with my VeraEdge Z-Wave based home automation system. Been using Imperihome for years.  However I think the new monthly fees are excessive! Increase the one off app purchase fee if need be. But these monthly fees will drive new users away.

author: Joshua Brewer
comment: Create an account? Really? I paid for the premium version only to be locked out of my house because they suddenly want me to create an account? Then I try to sign up and the form crashes constantly? The hell with this i'd like my money back

author: James Poyser
comment: Distinctly average. RFID support doesn't work, and don't bothering email support - they don't reply. It's an OK app, but not worth paying monthly for it. Can't wait for someone to fill the gap they've created with a better app.

author: Adam Spicer
comment: Yeelight option doesn't work. Scans for bulb then when it tries to validate says there is no bulb. This is with developer mode on and on the same network

reply.author: Evertygo
reply.content: Adam, Very strange we have many users with Yellight and there is no issue for instance. Could you contact support@imperihome.com Thank you

author: Joseph Kousa
comment: Pathetic. Monthly charge for a page payout. How childish.  I brought the premium app that no longer exist. I want refund now.

reply.author: Evertygo
reply.content: Joseph, you comment is not very clear. If you purchased the Pro version in the past, now you get the Premium without any additional charge. Regards,

author: T. Bezak
comment: Found yeelight bulb but not yeelight light strip.

reply.author: Evertygo
reply.content:
Hello,

Please contact our technical team at support@imperihome.com

Best Regards

author: Chris Zu
comment: Want my money back!

reply.author: Evertygo
reply.content: Hello Chris, If you are looking for free only, you can use the Freemium... Regards,

author: nagy zizi
comment: R.I.P ImperiHome? From 5 Star to 1 Star !! OLD REVIEW: ( "All in one. The Best Home Automation app on the market so far. After the try, happily payed the PRO version." )   NEW REVIEW:  NOT 5 STAR anymore!!! I'm a home automation installer and Me and my consumers love this very useful app but to be honest no-one going to pay nearly £5/month  £60/year !!!  to use this app. This is a home automation app and probably most of us not bothered to know about Smart Cities Just make another app for Smart City.  If you have to, Rise up the one off fee and keep your fans !

reply.author: Evertygo
reply.content: Dear Nagy, thank you for your comments. You and your customers will probably be very interested to get their electrical, gaz or water consumptions in real time.... This is just an exemple of the benefits of the Smart City. A smart home should be integrated inside the Smart City. If not, it will be a useless Smart Home.  Regards,

author: Mark Ryba
comment: So I have purchased the pro version last year before the monthly fees were introduced , now it is not available for download anymore. I have created an account but the free version has all the pro features locked. It was promised to us that the pro users would not have to pay monthly anymore. This is messed up.

reply.author: Evertygo
reply.content:
Hi, 
As a former PRO user, the PREMIUM status is granted. If you having issues with your account, please send your login to contact@imperihome.com

author: Mike O
comment: Need an account just to try it? And subscription? What is this? No local out of the cloud control of MY home automation? I'll stick with the old OpenHAB app and 3hou.se, you keep your garbage nonsense.

reply.author: Evertygo
reply.content: Dear Mike, thank you for your comment. There is no cloud control, our App can be used locally. Regards,

author: Paul Brotherton
comment: Was worth the one off fee for Pro, I have it on iPad and android devices, but not worth nearly £5 a month. A complete rip off and joke

reply.author: Evertygo
reply.content: Dear Paul, Nice to see that you have used our solution during years without any issue. We keep your comment in consideration and hope you will enjoy the future functionalities of our service. Regards,

author: J. Sundari
comment: Was thinking to use this because the privacy of a personal cloud, local backup, ... . Now that they want to steal my data, we will search for an alternative.

reply.author: Evertygo
reply.content: Hello Sir, we are not stealing any data. We have probably the strongest privacy rules of the market, check our T&C please. We are not using the data of our customers. Regards,

author: scott miller
comment: Was great until made mandatory to create account.   Kind of slow now.

reply.author: Evertygo
reply.content: Dear Scott, the creation of your personal account has no impact with the speed. If you are facing any problem please support@imperihome.com Regards,

author: Bruce Lee
comment: If it doesn't work with Wink & you know it doesn't work with Wink. Why do you indicate that it works with Wink?

reply.author: Evertygo
reply.content:
Hi,
Wink confirmed us, they have some difficulties with 3rd parties apllication. They promessed us to fix it asap (that was 3 weeks ago). We expect the issue to be solved at any moment.

Wink has solved the technical issue - please check

author: Phuong T. Vu
comment: Recent update fixed video monitoring from IP cameras on my Vera Edge. Thank you.

reply.author: Evertygo
reply.content: You are welcome !

author: Tim Alexander
comment: No way on the monthly fees.  The whole reason for wanting a product like this is to avoid them

author: Shawn
comment: If you're a Vera user, this is absolutely your best interface for mobile devices! Clean, smooth and fast! Best of all, it makes very good use of screen space. If you're tired of scrolling forever through the Vera app and waiting forever for devices to turn off or on, this is the solution you have been looking for. The developers are great as well. They seem to always be working to improve their product and the customer experience.

reply.author: Evertygo
reply.content: Thank you very much, Shawn, for your comment. We will continue to try to be innovative in our next update.

author: Nikos L
comment: I loved this app for managing my home automation so much that I bought the Pro version. Just before the holidays Evertygo decided to create a new version which broke the Pro version by requiring for the existing owners to create an account. On my case the transition was not smooth but after some work from the support/development department, it looks my account is operating as expected now.

reply.author: Evertygo
reply.content:
Hello Nikos,
Since we sent you yesterday the confirmartion that your login and status are well validated you didn't succed to connect to the APP?
It would be easier to communicate with the personnal email address we used yesterday. Thanks

author: Bryan Cripps
comment: Free version is a trial version at best, you limit the dash panels and then remove a couple blocks in those panels... really. Not worth $5 a month, you would be better off charging for a yearly release of like $15. I don't care for the improvements, i just want the app as it is when i pay for it.

reply.author: Evertygo
reply.content: Bryan, Thank you for your comments but most of our customers want to pay for a service which include permanent improvements, new connected devices/brands and new functionnalities. Regards,

author: Bob Fox
comment: Looks cool, but doesn't connect to Wink as advertised. Web forums say they don't provide enough connections, but I don't know if that's the cause or not.  EDIT: I contacted support as suggested in a response to this review. They said it's a known issue and they will let me know if they get it fixed. Also of note regarding my original review is the more detailed error message reported by the ImperiHome iPhone app: "Error authenticating. Client has reached max number of allowed users (500)."

reply.author: Evertygo
reply.content: Bob, This is not true. You just have to contact@imperihome.com or support@imperihome.com if you need any assistance. Regards,

author: Nicholas Kreucher
comment: 5 -> 2 stars because of forced account creation. don't turn this into a cloud service. many of us use it to control *local* devices only and this app was perfect for it. I purchased Pro it was so nice. local backup of config to bootstrap more phones, tablets is all that's needed. NO CLOUD SERVICE!!!!

reply.author: Evertygo
reply.content: Dear Nicholas, the success of ImperiHome is based on permanent improvements: new connected devices, new services.... The creation of personal accounts allow us to provide more functionalities that you will be free to use or not. Regards,

author: Joe Peregrin
comment: Good app until they forced users to create an account. Keep your 'new premium' features, I don't need them.  I enjoyed the previous functionality.  You changed the rules of the game halfway through. I'm out.  There are alternative available without ham-handedly requiring user accounts.

reply.author: Evertygo
reply.content: Dear Joe, We need to improve our solution permanently, sorry about that ! The creation of a personal account for a person using connected devices is not really what we can call a change of rules ! Regards,

author: Chad Roback
comment: Loved this app until the added the monthly fee. I planned to use this on all my installs but no one wants to pay monthly fees.  Please make a different version for the people who don't want the smart city options. Very disappointed!

reply.author: Evertygo
reply.content: Dead Chad, Our solution is permanently integrating new devices, new connected brands and new services in order to let our customers free to include new devices and new services in their smart home. This is the reason we have a subscription model. Please notice that there is no time commitment. So you are free to stop at any time. Regards,

author: Mike Parrett
comment: Useless! Signed up for the account and can not link my wink hub. I've tried over and over and keep getting web authorization failed. Tried to contact support but got no response. Rip off!!!  Update: I've tried to contact wink support and they said that they do not handle support for third-party applications the support that I need would need to come from your support group, which I have sent 3 emails to with no reply! I am using a wink Hub 2 and they did however want to know what kind of authorization token you are using they said you should be using 0Auth2 not sure if this is the case. I will change my rating of this apps once it is all fixed.

reply.author: Evertygo
reply.content: Hello Mike, Did you try to share your issue with Wink also? The support provides you an answer for sure. Regards,

comment: This app was very the best of the market until it's beginning to be a cash machine...  Why do we need to pay a monthly fee for services that we don't need... I have to find now an alternative solution even if I bought it on several devices for different domotic usage. This sales strategy is far away of the initial spirit. I'm afraid that interoperability benefits will disappear soon. The key added value of this app was to be autonomous and not cloud service dependant but with the capability to use internet services. I hope that they will react and they will offer solution which pro features without mandatory internet services like smart city.  The one shot cost should stay the core price model with optional internet service subcription... If not this app will disappear and will be substituted by a website as it's really cheaper...

reply.author: Evertygo
reply.content: Hello, thank you for your comments. The application side of ImperiHome keep autonomous. ImperiHome is integrating new connected devices/brands every month in order to keep the leading App you know. The creation of your personal account will provide you access to optional services on the web that you will be free to use or not. Regards,

author: Marko Marušić
comment: I loved the app untill they made an update forcing the users to create an account. If I wes able to still use the features i had without an account I would but this way -> uninstall I just lost a good app... :(

reply.author: Evertygo
reply.content:
Dear Marko,
As you know the opening of an account is the rule for connected devices or automation hubs - nothing special. We implemented it because we are providing more functionalities. Regards

author: Anon Y. Mous
comment: Rated down after forced account. I don't want any cloud or subscription service! ...Sad, the previous version(s) have served me well and was worth the pro cost.

reply.author: Evertygo
reply.content: Anon, The ImperiHome App is a native App which is NOT sending any data to the cloud. The registration of an account is not changing anything. Regards,

author: Emil Nilsson
comment: Latest update forces users to create an account. Not what I want unless it would give my benefit of it! Loved it before that but now I'm uninstall it. There are other free apps out there!

author: Stephen Davey
comment: It was great till you started to force us to have an account I don't want any of my home automation on the net. It works fine for me using a vpn to home. If I can't use it without signing then please refund as the app is now useless.

reply.author: Evertygo
reply.content: Bonjour Stephen, Ravis que vous ayez été satisfait de nos services. Pour pouvoir développer de nouvelles fonctionnalités et fournir à nos clients toujours le meilleur niveau de service, la création de compte est devenue en effet une obligation. Nous n'avions plus le choix. Cordialement,

comment: I bought the pro version before account creation with the online platform was mandatory. Now I MUST use an account. I don't want to be connected to the developers, I don't want my data to be sent *anywhere* without my consent. The account thing should be *optional* for users to get certain features, not obligatory. I am disappointed, would not buy it again under these circumstances and will watch out for an alternative.

reply.author: Evertygo
reply.content:
Hello,
The creation of account is JUST to identify you as a former "PRO" users in order to give you free acces to all new services and features. NO DATA are collected from your connected object. We have a very strict Privacy Policy http://www.imperihome.com/privacy/ and WE ARE NOT SELLING OR TRADING ANY PERSONNAL INFORMATION

author: Bud C.
comment: Thanks for treating me like a thief. I payed for app, and now I have to create an account so you know who I am? Do you really think your customers are stupid enough to believe that tripe?

reply.author: Evertygo
reply.content:
Bud,
We do not ask our customers to create their own secured accounts in order to know who they are ! You just need to register with your own login and your own password. This process is very common for connected devices and hubs. You get now automatically the Premium level with more functionalities. Regards,

author: Matthew Schoeneman
comment: No documentation and now everything is in a foreign non-English language since the update to accounts/smart city. Very confusing!

reply.author: Evertygo
reply.content:
Hello Matthew
Sorry for the confusion. 
Could you be more specfic, which pages you didn't find in English. If this the registration form   we had a "mixed" with the French page. It is now fixed. Do not hesitate to contact us at contact@imperihome.com for any matters.

author: Paul Katchuk
comment: I loved this app till the new update! Now the app is incredibly sluggish. Takes forever to reload the plugins. Then there is also a delay before the lights go on or off. Why change something that worked?

reply.author: Evertygo
reply.content:
Hello,
The new update should not change anything to your installation. Can you send us to contact@imperiHome .com your login and your type of installation

author: Tech Talk
comment: Bring out a different version if you want to charge a monthly subscription. Don't change the rules for people that paid for pro already. Yes, you will reply that it is to identify the pro version users to give them new premium features but we don't require new features or we wouldn't have bought the pro already. You will wait a few months and slowly make key current options/features subscription base and call it an improvement. We are wise to what you are doing. You reply that pro users will never have to pay subscription fees EVER to use your software or get updates and I will change my rating.

reply.author: Evertygo
reply.content: Sorry you missed the different message we have already written in that store. All former PRO users will have free access to new features and services but also updates. In short, after former PRO users have created their account everything will remain as usual, NO extra fee EVER, No software limitation, ...

author: Matt B
comment: Great until late one night I went to turn off my bedroom fan and got forced to create a stupid account just so I could do so.  The account should be OPTIONAL and NOT stop existing users from using their own system until they're blackmailed into forking over personal information.  Now it also wants to have location access... No thanks! Just control my devices I don't need any of your spying cloud junk.

reply.author: Evertygo
reply.content:
Hi Matt,
We don't need more than an email address, to identify you as an historical PRO user and give you a free access to all new services and functionnalities. The location access is optional, but will provide you much more precise information in case you using Smart City Open Data.

author: Rich Lumb
comment: Very useful local and remote control of my Vera plus HA. Please address maximum temperature on a Virtual Thermostat, it does not allow range for Hot water, 45 to 60 deg.C

author: Kelly Huffman
comment: Sucks. I have been using this app for over a year and paid for it. Now I'm forced to create a account and now it's said have to pay a monthly fee. Rip off

reply.author: Evertygo
reply.content:
Hello,
As a PRO user you won't have to pay anything to access for FREE to all new services and features. We just need you to create an account to identify you as a former users.

author: Andrew Neale
comment: Disappointed that after buying the pro version the rules suddenly change and an uneccessary user account is required. Will be looking for another app.

reply.author: Evertygo
reply.content: Hello, The rules don't change. You were PRO you are now PREMIUM, with full access to our new services to come. For technical reason, we just need you to register.

author: Anders Johnsson
comment: Was about to let my parents run this. But! Monthly subscription of 55 Sek!! That's a rip off!! Go back to the old pro ONE TIME FEE!

reply.author: Evertygo
reply.content:
Hello,
We are sorry you didn't noticed the message we sent you beginning of December. The purpose of our message was to avoid this kind of situation.

author: Guardian Arias
comment: Needs an account no longer trust to control my home devices

reply.author: Evertygo
reply.content:
Hello,
We need to identify our former PRO user JUST to grant them a free access to all our new services and features. There is no collect of data from connected object. Very strict security policy http://www.imperihome.com/privacy/ . Same account process when you buy some devices from NEST, Philpps HUE, Netatmo, Fitbit, or all other manufacturer
